title: MetaTagDB â€” Media Tagging & Hash DB
blurb: Content-addressable metadata for media: SHA-256 fingerprints, tags, and replicable catalogs.
description: MetaTagDB is a media tagging system and distributed metadata hash database. It emits content-addressable records (SHA-256, size, MIME, timestamps, and user tags) and supports merging, signing, and replication across peers. Use cases include forensics triage, authenticated leak catalogs, deduplication, and cross-set reconciliation.
